mapper.sql: wid, uid, wnumber, wbank, wmoney, wcounterfee, wactual, wstate, wtime
mapper.insert:
insert into withdrawals
wid,
uid,
wnumber,
wbank,
wmoney,
wcounterfee,
wactual,
wstate,
wtime,

mapper.update:
update withdrawals
uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
wnumber = #{wnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wbank = #{wbank,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wmoney = #{wmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
wcounterfee = #{wcounterfee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
wactual = #{wactual,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
wstate = #{wstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wtime = #{wtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where wid = #{wid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update withdrawals set uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, wnumber = #{wnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wbank = #{wbank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wmoney = #{wmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, wcounterfee = #{wcounterfee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, wactual = #{wactual,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, wstate = #{wstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wtime = #{wtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where wid = #{wid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
